title: How do I save messages as drafts?
answer:
When writing a message, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208144043108001.png) or ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208144043100002.png) to save the message as a draft, which will be displayed the next time you open that thread.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208144044268003.png)

To save a message as a draft, you must enter a recipient.
